precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The context menu on the Windows XP desktop is open, showing options like 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', and 'Properties'.
expected_results: The context menu will close. The 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open and the "Theme:" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Theme:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available screen saver themes.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu displays a currently selected screen saver.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Screen Saver" selection box.
expected_results: The screen saver dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible within the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, overlaying the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the dropdown menu for the 'Turn off monitor' setting.
expected_results: A list of time intervals will appear, allowing you to choose when the monitor should turn off.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu will close. The 'Never' option will be selected, indicating the monitor will not automatically turn off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu should display "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the "Display Properties" window will remain open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.
